topics.title: Photosynthesis
topics.summary: Light-dependent reactions produce ATP and NADPH; Calvin cycle fixes CO2 into sugars; overall 6CO2+6H2O+light→C6H12O6+6O2.

topics.title: HTTP vs HTTPS
topics.summary: HTTPS adds TLS for encryption and authentication; methods, status codes, and semantics match HTTP.

topics.title: Renaissance Art
topics.summary: Linear perspective, humanism, Medici patronage, and masters like Leonardo, Michelangelo, Raphael.

topics.title: Kamala Harris
topics.summary: Served as U.S. Vice President (2021–2025); previous roles include U.S. Senator and California Attorney General.
